body_html: I am ok with a virtual function on Type or Tensor. It seems to me that Variable is no less special than isSparse(), which we have a function for already, and adding one small function is not a problem.

body: I am ok with a virtual function on Type or Tensor. It seems to me that Variable is no less special than isSparse(), which we have a function for already, and adding one small function is not a problem.
